CustomAction.Code: Log(System.Drawing.Color.DarkOliveGreen,"[PB - N] 1-525 Cooking-Fishing [Cicrocoft & AtticusG3]");

Settings.Name: Auction Meat
Settings.Summary: Do you want to Auction left over meat? If False, will mail.

Declaration.Code: public void SetSettings(){var mh = Me.Inventory.Equipped.GetEquippedItem(WoWInventorySlot.MainHand); var oh = Me.Inventory.Equipped.GetEquippedItem(WoWInventorySlot.OffHand); if (mh.ItemInfo.WeaponClass != WoWItemWeaponClass.FishingPole) { Settings["Main Hand"] = (int)mh.ItemInfo.Id; if (oh != null) { Settings["Off Hand"] = (int)oh.ItemInfo.Id; } else { Settings["Off Hand"] = 0; } } }

public void EquipItems(int MH, int OH) {var inv = Me.BagItems; foreach (WoWItem item in inv) { if (item != null && (int)item.ItemInfo.Id == MH) item.UseContainerItem(); } Thread.Sleep(1000); if (OH != 0) { foreach (WoWItem item in inv) { if (item != null && (int) item.ItemInfo.Id == OH) { item.UseContainerItem(); } } } }

CustomAction.Code: SwitchToBot("Combat Bot");
